name: biomni-download-synapse-data
title: Biomni: Download Synapse Data
description: Download data from Synapse using entity IDs. Uses the synapse CLI to download files, folders, or projects from Synapse. Requires SYNAPSE_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable for authentication.
content:
Overview

Download data from Synapse using entity IDs. Uses the synapse CLI to download files, folders, or projects from Synapse. Requires SYNAPSE_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable for authentication.

Category

support_tools
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/support_tools/download_synapse_data.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
